page.title: 17ELY FESTIVAL
page.content: The Ely Festival all started when the National Eisteddfod in 1978,was on.They wanted to celebrate the National Eisteddfod so they did that.They thought it was such a good hit they did it every year.On the first day of the Ely Festival,a Saturday they have a fete with all sideshows and stalls and it takes place on the Western Leisure Centre field. Then on Sunday there is a fete up Wilson Road there are inflatables and Coconut Shies and all other stalls. During Sunday as well there is a history walk there is also one on Wednesday with an historian called Steve Jones leading the walk.During the week there is an Ely old and new Exhibition,Nigel Billingham was the one who organiized this.There was also a fete up by Careau Infants School,
